overview:
Jacob is a VP at Enemy Unknown, makers of Avatars United, a social network for virtual world avatars.

Jacob heads up the Avatars United Developer Platform, a set of APIs, tools and resources that allow developers to build social applications on Avatars United. He oversees software development, product management, support and relations with the developer community. He also handles compliance with the Google Gadgets and OpenSocial specifications and maintains Avatars United’s OpenSocial container.

Previously, Jacob worked with database technologies at GroupSwim and he has also built web applications for e-commerce, mobile phones and pension funds. Before working on software, Jacob studied media technology at LinkÃ¶ping University.
